FullDescription: Spoil your golf buddies or yourself with the Altitude Eighteen Golf Set. The set includes the following:- Dublin 6-Can Cooler: Made from 600D and lined with PEVA, the cooler bag has a cork panel insert right around the bottom of the bag, with grey padding, a front slip pocket, an adjustable shoulder strap, and can hold up to 6 cans or a lunch box and snacks.- Erinvale Golf Towel: Made from 400g/m2 100% cotton, the towel has a flat brandable strip woven into it to showcase your logo and a plastic hook for easy hanging. - Kooshty Pura Glass Water Bottle: Made from glass, the 500ml bottle has a watertight stainless steel screw-off lid and is a great eco-savvy bottle to use and refill with your favourite liquids repeatedly. Use & Care: Wash before first use. Not suitable for hot liquids. Only the bottle is dishwasher safe, but not the lid.Caution: Do not use glassware that is chipped or cracked.- Golf Set: Made up of six golf tees, a ball marker and a divot tool.
